messages.speech:
"Select the external booking form on https://uk.sodexonet.com/home/hr/learning--development/ld-course-forms.html
Complete the form and send to your L&D Business Partner for approval (unless you are requesting a First Aid course in which case send the form directly to PeopleCentre)
If approved the form should be sent to PeopleCentre who will book the course"
